spacegame

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.image.ImageView
        • spacegame.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, GameObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlayerMP

    public class Player
extends javafx.scene.image.ImageView
implements GameObject
    A player class for the game. This class extends ImageView. Thus the player object can be placed directly on a pane. This class also implements the GameObject (currently unused).
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Simon Borgström
    See Also:
    ImageView

        posX - - The TranslateX position of the player
        posY - - The TranslateY position of the player
        rotate - - The Rotate of the player
        speed - - The speed which the player travels
